hero.subtitle: Discover how we blend centuries-old tarot traditions with cutting-edge artificial intelligence to provide you with personalized cosmic guidance.

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.desc: Advanced AI interprets your cards with personalized, meaningful guidance

cosmic.title: Cosmic Experience
cosmic.desc: Immerse yourself in a beautiful galaxy-themed interface with smooth animations

personal.title: Personal Journey
personal.desc: Each reading is tailored to your unique questions and spiritual path

story.title: Our Spiritual Journey
story.p1: Asking Fate was born from a deep reverence for the mystical arts and a vision to make ancient wisdom accessible to everyone. We believe that the universe speaks to us through symbols, and tarot cards have been humanity's way of interpreting these cosmic messages for centuries.
story.p2: Our journey began with a simple question: How can we honor the sacred tradition of tarot while making it more accessible and insightful for modern seekers?

aiSection.title: Advanced AI Technology
aiSection.p1: Our AI system has been trained on thousands of traditional tarot interpretations, symbolic meanings, and archetypal patterns. It doesn't just provide generic readings—it analyzes your specific question, considers the unique combination of cards drawn, and generates personalized insights.
aiSection.p2: The AI understands the nuanced relationships between cards, their positions, and the context of your inquiry to deliver guidance that feels both authentic and deeply personal.

respectfulTradition.title: Respectful Tradition
respectfulTradition.description: We honor the sacred origins of tarot while making it accessible to modern seekers on their spiritual journey.

personalizedGuidance.title: Personalized Guidance
personalizedGuidance.description: Every reading is unique to you, your question, and your current life circumstances for meaningful insights.

inclusiveCommunity.title: Inclusive Community
inclusiveCommunity.description: We welcome seekers from all backgrounds and beliefs, creating a safe space for spiritual exploration.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.desc: Join thousands of seekers who have discovered deeper insights about their path through our AI-powered tarot readings.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.intro: Have questions about your cosmic journey? We're here to help guide you through the stars.

email.title: Email Support
email.desc: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours during business days.
email.label: support@cosmictarot.com

chat.title: Live Chat
chat.desc: Chat with our support team in real-time for immediate assistance.

response.title: Response Time
response.desc: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. Premium subscribers receive priority support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1Title: How accurate are the AI readings?
faq.q1Desc: Our AI provides insights based on traditional tarot symbolism, but readings are for guidance and entertainment.
faq.q2Title: Is the service free to use?
faq.q2Desc: Our service is completely free to use. No subscriptions or payments required.

faq.howToGetStars: How do I get more stars?
faq.howToGetStarsAnswer: You can purchase stars through our billing page or earn them through special promotions. Check the pricing page for current packages.
faq.refundPolicyAnswer: We offer refunds within 7 days of purchase for unused stars. Contact us with your transaction details for assistance.
faq.dataPrivacyAnswer: Yes, all your readings and personal information are kept completely private and secure. We never share your data with third parties.
faq.readingAccuracyAnswer: Our AI-powered interpretations provide insightful guidance based on traditional tarot wisdom. Use them as a tool for reflection and personal growth.
